statements: SELECT * FROM gps_data WHERE device_id = '12345';
SELECT id, timestamp, latitude FROM gps_data WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM gps_data WHERE latitude < 0 AND longitude > 0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM gps_data ORDER BY device_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, latitude, longitude FROM gps_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM gps_data WHERE latitude > 40.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, timestamp FROM gps_data WHERE longitude < -70.0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM gps_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY longitude DESC, latitude ASC;
SELECT id, device_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM gps_data WHERE device_id = 'abc123' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM gps_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 35.0 AND 45.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -75.0 AND -65.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, model FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, manufacturer, model FROM devices WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE device_id > 5 AND model LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, COUNT(*) as num_records FROM locations GROUP BY location_id HAVING num_records > 5 ORDER BY num_records DESC;

SELECT device_name, manufacturer, model, serial_number FROM devices JOIN locations ON devices.device_id = locations.device_id WHERE latitude >= 40.0 AND longitude <= -75.0 ORDER BY device_name ASC, manufacturer DESC;
SELECT MAX(latitude) as max_lat, MIN(longitude) as min_lon FROM locations WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple');
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM gps_data;
SELECT device_id, device_name, firmware_version FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT geofence_id, geofence_name, create_date FROM geofences WHERE geofence_id = 100;
SELECT device_id, device_name, battery_level FROM devices WHERE battery_level > 50 ORDER BY battery_level ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_update FROM devices WHERE last_update BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, battery_level FROM devices WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT device_id, last_update FROM devices WHERE last_update BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(battery_level) AS max_battery_level FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM gps_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM gps_devices WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM gps_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM gps_locations WHERE latitude >= 40.0 AND longitude <= -75.0;
SELECT geofence_name, radius, coordinates ->> 'city' AS city FROM geofences;
SELECT * FROM gps_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_status FROM gps_devices WHERE device_status = true;
SELECT l.latitude, l.longitude, l.timestamp, d.device_name FROM gps_locations l INNER JOIN gps_devices d ON l.device_id = d.device_id;
SELECT g.geofence_id, g.geofence_name, g.radius, jsonb_array_length(g.coordinates->'coordinates') AS num_coordinates FROM geofences g;
SELECT l.log_id, l.trigger_event, l.trigger_time, d.device_name FROM location_logs l LEFT JOIN gps_devices d ON l.location_id = d.device_id;
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE device_id = 12345;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM device_information ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT geofence_name, latitude, longitude, radius FROM geofence_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM location_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0;

SELECT device_information.device_name, location_data.latitude, location_data.longitude FROM device_information INNER JOIN location_data ON device_information.device_id = location_data.device_id WHERE device_information.manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT user_data.username, user_data.email, alerts.alert_type FROM user_data LEFT JOIN alerts ON user_data.user_id = alerts.device_id ORDER BY alerts.timestamp ASC;
SELECT geofence_name, latitude, longitude, radius FROM geofence_data WHERE radius BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
